content: HDI-P TZ Drop-in anchor Ultimate-performance short drop in anchor for shallow embedments in cracked/uncracked concrete and seismic applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Higher productivity – shallow drilling and faster installations when used with the HDI-P TZ 2-in-1 setting tool and a hammer drill Increased performance – short drop-in anchor with optimized length for reliable fastenings in hollowcore concrete planks and post-tensioned cable concrete slabs Easier and more accurate - lip provides flush installation, consistent anchor depth, and easy anchor rod alignment Virtually dust-free – pair with Hilti Dust Removal System (DRS) for compliance with Table 1 of OSHA 1926.1153 regulations for silica dust exposure Easier to specify and design – pair with PROFIS Engineering software to simplify the design of concrete connections and reduce material costs Applications Post-installed fastening point for suspended pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, seismic bracing, and other overhead elements Suitable in cracked, uncracked, and hollowcore concrete, including seismic areas For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer ### ITEMS- 2351791 -
